faction.name: RoamingEnclave
faction.description:
A grand migration, the Neinzul are returning to the galaxy. Lead by individually weak Roaming Enclaves, these Neinzul desire to continue their legacy, and will stake their claim to the galaxy with various Hives.
Should you deem the cost worthy, you'll find yourself housing a new species within your borders, using vast swarms of Younglings to bolster your empire.
Be wary, for you are not the Enclaves' only potential ally.
<color=#f25e1c>MEDIUM IMPACT:</color> This faction seeks to make this galaxy its home, and will attempt to integrate into other factions over the course of the game. They will defend territory that they claim, but are generally weaker than major factions.
Note: Enabling this faction will allow them to spawn alongside all Teams in the game by default. For extra customization options, please check the Enclaves tab in Options.

custom_field.name: Intensity
custom_field.description: Just how effective is this faction?

faction.name: RoamingEnclavePearl
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, part of the Player team.

faction.name: RoamingEnclaveCrystal
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, that is Hostile to All.

faction.name: RoamingEnclaveDiamond
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, part of the AI team.

faction.name: RoamingEnclaveRuby
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, part of the Red team.

faction.name: RoamingEnclaveSaphire
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, part of the Blue team.

faction.name: RoamingEnclaveEmerald
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, part of the Green team.

faction.name: RoamingEnclaveOnyx
faction.description: A subfaction of the Enclaves, part of the Dark Alliance team.
